title.narrative: Innovative Instruments to Foster Energy Efficiency in SMEs in Colombia

description.narrative: Facilitate SME access to the market for specialized EE financial and technical services, and to enable them to invest in measures that reduce energy costs and lower GHG emissions.

participating-org.narrative: Inter-American Development Bank, Inter-American Investment Corporation and Multilateral Investment Fund

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
